issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
before I could not run the app in the simulator installed a previous version of the 3.0 titanium and decided, after installing the update can not run on devices.
Run with iOS device and the window with error appears



h3. Actual Result
Unable to locate the CLI executable. Please restart Studio or use Help > Check for Titanium Updates to install Titanium CLI.

h3. Expected Result
app run on device
